Una auténtica genialidad. Cortito y dinámico, no es complicado pero si te hará pensar pero, sobretodo, muy entretenido y un buenísimo punto de partida para la master piece que es el segundo, aunque no veo a ninguno de los juegos por separado, deben de jugarse ambos.
Zwar ein relativ altes Spiel ,aber trotzdem ein sehr gutes. Sehr Empfehlenswehrt =)
Aucun lag un peut court et manque de contenue. je la conseil mais au vraix debutant sinon vous le finirez en 2 jours.

Bon, certes, le jeu est plutôt court, MAIS:
Ce n'est pas un jeu vidéo, c'est LE jeu vidéo. Si VALVe n'avait pas fait ce jeu, le monde actuel ne serait pas le même (c'est à peine exagéré). Non, sérieux, qu'est-ce qui fait que [i]Portal[/i] est un incontournable ? Bah, c'est portal tout simplement: un gameplay très novateur quand il est sorti, des bons graphismes (pas exceptionnels mais bons tout de même), GLaDOS, etc... À acheter d’urgence si vous ne l’avez pas encore fait.
great game, achievements and bonus levels keep you entertained!

Hier mal ne Liste was ich gut fand und was ich nicht gut fand:

+Gute Grafik ( Jahr 2007)
+Die Physik im Spiel ist cool;D
+Nicht sehr teuer. Hab mir das Portal Bundel für 12,49 Gekauft.

-Zu Kurz (Portal 2 hatte ich erst nach 6 Stunden durch)
Sonst ist mir nichts negatives mehr aufgefallen;D Fand das Spiel einfach nur zu kurz.

Je l'ai acheté durant ces soldes steam pour 6 de 5€; J'avais toujours entendu parler de ce jeu en bien, et effectivement, il est excellent. Le gameplay est juste énorme, le level design super bien fait sans etre trop compliqué, j'ai terminé les 19 salles en 4h. Un peu court, mais très très bon. Ca fait longtemps que je n'avais pas été autant captivé par un jeu pour son ambiance, la réflexion qu'il apporte, le scénario ( y en a t il vraiment un d'ailleurs ?). Ne rien savoir donne un coté stressant, mais permet aussi d'être encore plus plongé dans le jeu, et de toujours vouloir avancé pour savoir la suite. 

10/10

Y los mejores créditos que he visto nunca. Recordad, the cake is a lie.

[h1] Evaluation de Portal [/h1]

Je recommande ce jeu, car c'est un des meilleurs puzzle-game de ses dernières années même si sa durée de vie est vraiment très courte et que le deuxième opus est largement mieux à mon sens.
Une des principales qualité du jeu est aussi son humour qui est omniprésent et jamais en trop, il rajoute un interet au jeu, qui plus est l'histoire bien que peu ambitieuse reste d'une qualité notable.

Bref, je ne saurais que vous conseiller ce jeu, mais si vous devez choisir entre les deux Portal, prenez le second.

Muy recomendable.

Juego realmente entretenido, te hace pensar en como superar cada obstáculo, sobre todo los más complejos.
Lástima que sea tan corto el hilo principal.

8/10

FPS and puzzle game, I'm in.

While this is a 7 year old game, I just got around to playing (and subsequently finishing) it. I really shouldn't have to review this due to how kickass all valve games are, but just let me say the visuals still holdup today, the gameplay mechanics are flawlessly executed, and while the story at times may seem slightly nonexsistent it fits perfectly with the game and some heavy topics will weigh on your mind afterward. My only complaint is due to the fact that the game is on the shorter side taking me 2 hours to complete on my first playthrough, but I fell that the game may have become stale if it had went on for any longer than 10 or so hours.

My final rating: 9.5/10 a nearly perfect  puzzle game that I kinda wish had been longer, but at the same time and thankful that it isn't.
Отличная игра, тренирует мозг.

Отличная игра, одна из немногих игр, где нужно сначала 7 раз подумать, а потом уже делать. Присутствует атмосфера одиночества и безысходности, плюс троллинг от Глэдоса. Жаль, что коротковата, проходится за один присест, но есть усложненные камеры, которые не пройдутся за раз, там мозгу придется хорошо поработать.

Ребята, я не знаю зачем эта игра избегала меня вот уже 7 лет, но я-таки решился и поставил это чудо себе.
Зашел, значит, в главное меню (сразу же вспомнился пресловутый CS:Source), но ожидания были более чем, ведь на кануне я имел честь узнать мнение большинства моих знакомых об этом шедевре (как оно потом и подтвердилось) игровой индустрии.
Короче, парни, я просто кипятком писял от геймплея и тоненькой сюжетной линии!!
Еще ни от одной игры я не испытывал такого наслаждения!!

Although short, Portal is a very fun game to pick up and play. It is a nice transition from most FPS games nowadays and will get you thinking. I certainly enjoyed this game, and I was really sucked in when the game transitioned into a more "Fend for yourself" kind of game, trying to frantically escape and, most importantly, seeing the "unpolished" areas of Aperture, so to speak. From there on it seemed more realistic and a bit eerie (the rat man) up until the final boss battle. I would very much reccomend this to anyone, but I do warn you, if you dislike puzzles this game is definately not for you!
Fantasic Game!
Game=Awesome!
Evet
Very fun game but too short

I played this after playing Portal 2.

It is way shorter than Portal 2 (it was only 19 chambers), no multiplayer and the levels do not have a huge amount of variety, in part because some elements of Portal 2 like the gels, the beams or trampolines do not exist in this game. I felt the levels were easier than Portal 2, but that may just be because i put 37 hours on Portal 2 before playing this.
The pieces of dialogue were good and enjoyable but again...not as good as Portal 2.

If you want a Portal game, i would say to pick up Portal 2 directly, it's a superior game in every way possible, you don't need to worry about this one. If you want to know a little bit more about Glados, or you just want to know what happened before the events of Portal 2, or even if puzzle games is not your thing and you want a light introduction to Portal, then go ahead and buy this one too, but see Portal as a "warm-up" for the real thing, that being Portal 2.

Ah oh, let's not forget this game has the best credits screen in all of video games history :)

este juego es muy entretenido, algunos puzzles son bastante complejos, pero con imaginacion se pueden resolver, las torretas tienen un tono de voz bastante divertido con dialogos muy curiosos.

I need not describe the components of this game. In fact, i don't really need to write a review for this at all. Everyone knows this game is great. That being said, I just realized that i beat this game in like two and a half hours. Despite its length, this is a great buy if it is on sale.
just plane out fun

Great modern classic is contained within the walls of Aperture Science. Thou a bit short in length and the first few experiments of this game are super easy, the fun ramps up when the full portal gun is achieved. Experiments get progressively harder as one moves threw the testing grounds of Aperture Science.  The problems placed in your  path by Aperture Science's research departments pose no real hard thinking to solve, however it is all in the execution.  Plus there is cake involved!!  And if cake was not a big enough of a reward there are bonus maps at the end of a successful test cycle. 

Even thou this game was released back in 2007 if you have not played Portal before it is a great game for a Steam sale pickup and comes highly recommended.

O que dizer de Portal... Basicamente, o único problema é ser curto, dependendo é claro de sua facilidade para resolver os puzzles.

A proposta do jogo é algo incrível, a imersão que você tem com o ambiente do jogo é fantástico... Isso sem mencionar a jogabilidade, que é ótima.

Tudo isso misturado com uma vilã sarcástica e ao mesmo tempo carismática tornam o jogo excelente!

PS: A música dos créditos também é outra coisa boa do jogo. hehehe
This really is worthy of the hype. I've missed out for years :(
